# init(quantileRange:)

**Initializer**

Creates a robust scaler.

## Declaration

```swift
init(quantileRange: ClosedRange<Element> = 0.25...0.75)
```

## Parameters

- **quantileRange**: This scaler removes the median and scales the data according to the quantile range.
title: init(quantileRange:)
